hero_text: I am a student, passionate programmer and I appreciate new experiences.

content: Leading a group of students, introducing them to programming. Teaching them fundamental concepts. Encouraging logical and systematic thinking.
Developing small games and algorithms in Java. Working with the firms custom UI-Productivity-Framework.

websiteScores.d: The Lighthouse scores of some of the websites I built. It is important to mention that these scores aren't fully representative: Other aspects, like content and link-strategy have to be considered.

content.James: My new logo looks flawless and contributes to my social group's branding. Davide understood all relevant design aspects and I would recommend him to anyone interested.

content: I learned about topics such as SEO, Content-Marketing, Search-Engine-Advertising and online strategies of local businesses.
